morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow, Fresh Vibes
morningBrief.body: Solid refresh: 4" overnight freshened up the mountain nicely. The snow cats were busy. 11 trails in Lower Mountain and Upper Mountain looking mint. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.body: 6" dumped overnight. The stashes are loaded and the groomers are buried. Ski patrol went absolutely huge: 31 new runs available today.
